website_summaries.verdict: This multifunctional watch is built to last and provides extra features for kids that are similar to an adult version.
pros: Impressive functions including calendar, stopwatch, and alarm clock
Water-resistant up to 50 meters (as long as you don't press any buttons underwater)
cons: Big watch that may be too much for small wrists

customer_reviews.title: Large watch, good for teen+
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son just bought this for himself and is very pleased. So far it is waterproof and it is very easy to set and operate. It is much bigger than a typical boys watch. I would say it is more an adult size. My son is very tall for a 10 year old (closer to a 13 year old and in adult clothing/shoes) and this watch is still a very good fit and gives him room to grow in the strap. If you are looking for a little boys watch this is NOT for you, but for an older boy or teen or even a man it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Maty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch - my grandson LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson who is only 6 but more the size of an 8 year old. I was a bit concerned at first as it seemed a bit big for him but he absolutely loves it and never takes it off! He wears it with his camo outfits, wears it to school, sports, he swims and even showers with it on! Not sure how long it will last with all this use, but it was an absolute winner and worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Brends

customer_reviews.title: Great sports watch! Perfect for the outdoors!
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t just a kid watch, it’s for adults too! It’s perfect for anyone who loves camo and sports. It’s waterproof, the LED light shines bright at night, and isn’t bulky or heavy! It’s practically a GShock without the high sticker price. I’m glad I got this instead of a Casio, more bang for my buck! Overall, highly satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jbl8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for An Active Boy`
customer_reviews.text: This watch met my expectations for a reasonable price. Any little boy will feel like a real outdoorsman with this watch that seemingly does everything. It's not for the little ones. I would consider a good age for ages 10 and up.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great starter watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 year old nephew and he loves it. He wears it all the time and it's held up to the wear and tear he puts it through. I'm very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: My 12 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 12 year old last year when he was 11. He has a dream to be a U.S. spoofer since he was a toddler. He loves this watch! It was too big for him last year and he anxiously waited to grow, keeping it safe in his dresser drawer. He wears it daily now and loves the features; timer, stop watch, backlight, alarm, etc. He is pretty rambunctious and this watch has been durable enough to keep up with him daily.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: The color looks like website. It is durable and looks quality too
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my nephew. I myself have one too. The watch kind big for a kid's wrist but I think he will be okay as he is growing. The color looks like website. It is durable and looks quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Phan

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: After the watch was recovered from being lost, we finally were able to open the package and it looks like a nice watch. It was a little glitchy from the ice cold weather, but fine once it was room temp.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Stromberg

customer_reviews.title: 11 year old boy love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased tgis wristwatch for my 11 year old grandson and he loves it. As his mother was reading up on how to set it, he was doing it and loved all the things it could do.
customer_reviews.author: cswreno

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The picture is very deceiving. The picture made the watch look very nice. It was a Xmas present from Santa and it looked very cheap to am sorry I was not happy with the product at all. Unfortunately since it came from Santa I could not return it. Although I wanted to very bad
customer_reviews.author: Jmkb4

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This a gift for my grandson. I believe he will love it. This company is absolutely wonderful as they shipped quickly and provided a cost friendly quality item
customer_reviews.author: weizer parker

customer_reviews.title: Very large watch.
customer_reviews.text: It said it was ok for 9 year olds, but it is WAY too big. My 9 year old is the 2nd largest in his class, so I don't understand how it can say that.
customer_reviews.author: SGT Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not a kids watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough watch, but definitely not "boys" or "kids" as described....face/case is way too big. Fits my husband and his large wrists, but that's not who I ordered it for. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My 10-year-old son loves this watch. It’s very nice looking. It looks like we spent more than we did! It fits him well. I was worried that a lot of people said only for adult size or maybe teenager, but it fits my 10-year-old just fine! He is pretty rough on things and so far is as good as new 2 months in. Usually his watches are already breaking apart, so I am happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Light broke 2 days after my son got it. He was stuck at camp with no watch. It's cheap, but thought maybe it would last a week. I was wrong. Don't buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: *NOT a boys' watch*
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a boys' watch. It's HUGE. Suitable for a man who Is looking for a cheap, plastic watch. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBrood

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were so miniscule they were almost unreadable and seemingly were for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Rodney

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: My son, From birth, has had a fascination with rocks and watches. I bought his last watch for Christmas and it made it 8 months. When the strap broke, he was devastated. Mom said "it's not repairable so we'll have to get rid of it" "but Dad gave it to me" my son replied with tears in his eyes. I looked at him and said "I'll Buy you this one too son"...He smiled. These cheap pieces of junk get five stars not for quality or longevity but for the memories the last 3 watches have given me.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer and applier

customer_reviews.title: Color is wrong, size is wrong
customer_reviews.text: For a watch that was supposed to be a blue, kids-sized digital watch, it is neither of those things. First, it's a glittery purple, a far cry from blue, and also it's a monstrosity of a watch. almost a half inch thick and a band long enough to easily fit a grown man. I'm a decently big guy and it fit me with room to spare -- a longer band than the longest Apple watch band. Returned, and went with a Timex which is sized appropriately for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H.

customer_reviews.title: Still ticking
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 yr old grandson for Christmas and it is his most prized possession still. Had me make sure it was waterproof because there was no way in hell he was taking it off, even in the shower or at the indoor rec center pool. Even today, it is off for reason, it is within grasping distance of where he is. He can't tell time, but it doesn't matter to him. He loves his watch!
customer_reviews.author: lovetodecorate

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this watch and wear that every day his best friend has one also. Great working watch for any kid who likes the military look. With my seven-year-old on the tightest one so he can still grow into it and wear it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: User friendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old boy. This watch was easy for him to understand and setup. He was wearing/using it in no time! He can easily use all the features. It's nice quality. Fits his wrist (plenty of holes to tighten) and makes him feel very grown up. He uses the alarm features daily and loves that it beeps on the hour every hour. This was a perfect first watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddicted

customer_reviews.title: Just what an 11-year-old wants.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy that the watch came in a camouflage pattern. My son is obsessed with camo right now and this watch met his needs and completed his look. So far, it is functioning well. It was also within the budget of an 11-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: Effie

customer_reviews.title: Its huge!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is Huge! I got it for my 5 year old son. The face It's bigger then his fist balled up. The watch should be half the size to be for kids. But hopefully it will be strong enough to hold up to the abuse of a 5 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Hester FM

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch!
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! I bought this twice now- once for my son for Christmas and then a second time for his birthday 1 year later because he lost the first one in the lake. It wasn’t due to the tightness of the band or anything. He took it off in the water and dropped it and couldn’t find it again. Anyway, this has been his fav watch 1-2 years running now and he wears it religiously. Great quality and lasts a long time. We even had a friend buy one for her son because he loved it so much too. Definitely worth it! I will buy it again if needed or even as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra McKee

customer_reviews.title: too big for a kid
customer_reviews.text: This watch is almost the same size as adult gshock watches. I had bought it for my 7 year old son because it said "kids" watch, but its far too large and had to return it. Otherwise it looked like a cool watch and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's 9th birthday and he absolutely loved it! he had to test out the waterproofing so he immediately jumped in the pool! I have to say I was relieved that the waterproofing was correct.
customer_reviews.author: K Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 10 and 11 year old grandsons for them to wear for Safety Patrol at school so they know when to stop. They love them! The watches arrived in two days and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chevy Man

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch as a gift for my 6yr old nephew. Anything military is EVERYTHING to him. The watch looks and feels like a nice quality watch. Don’t assume that I since I purchased this for a little boy, that it is immature in nature. It’s not. It’s a very masculine and mature watch that happens to be able to also fit his wrist as it can adjust down to his size. It’s perfect for adults too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it suggests
customer_reviews.text: It says boy but it’s more to the adult size my son loves it won’t take it off
customer_reviews.author: Eladio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: An excited wee man
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for an 8 yr old whose Dad is serving in the military and the son who wants to be like his Dad. Just loves his army games. This was a very welcome gift. An excited wee man got this. And has hrs of enjoyment
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: That it works
customer_reviews.text: I have not fully examined the product as it's a Christmas gift for my grandson and it won't be open until then but, from what I can see through the package its what he asks for.
customer_reviews.author: karl moore

customer_reviews.title: Sprung a leak
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 8 months then leaked water and you can no longer read the time right. We never opened it to change the battery so no tampering caused this issue. My son has worn it nonstop and loved it all this time. We will try a different brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for my son for Christmas. He absolutely loved it, until he wore it on the slip in slide and it was water damaged. So we got him another one, since he was heart broken it didn’t work anymore and was filled with moisture. He is 9 and was very careful to take it off before showers, but forgot once and the second one is now unusable due to moisture in the watch. He again is upset. These watches aren’t water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Savoy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long and is not at all water resistant
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son LOVES this watch, but it doesn't last long. We've bought him 2 and neither one lasted more than a month. Which is really sad because it seems to be a great watch otherwise. The first one we thought it stopped working because he played around water with it, so we bought him another one. That one he was careful not to be in or around water with it and it still quit after a few weeks. I'm on the hunt to find him a durable kids watch!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Easter Bunny, can’t wait to show it off at school.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my Grandson who is 8 years old. He was and still is thrilled with his camouflage watch. He loves all things military. He told me the time every other minute for most of the first day. The quality is very good .
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L. Oday

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were searching for but couldn’t find in store
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my teenagers watch. It looks just like the one we bought in a store but couldn’t find in stock again. He likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew for Christmas two years ago (he’s 9 now) and he has worn it every single day since. We can’t even get him to take it off for bed sometimes! I was actually shocked at the quality alone, but especially for the price. Fully functioning, doesn’t feel cheap, water-proof... perfect. Unfortunately he just broke it last week when getting hit with a basketball, and I’ve already ordered another for him!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s HUGE
customer_reviews.text: This watch has nice features, but be aware it is HUGE...especially since it’s marketed as a kids watch. The pic is on a 10-year olds wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Katie McGuffee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves the watch! It's sturdy and he loves the alarm and stop watch. I would highly recommend this to others. It makes a great first watch.
customer_reviews.author: V Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for Christmas for my son and he loves it I think the best function of all is the way it looks for him
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great youth military looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for my 9 year old GI Joe, Ha. He loves his camo "military" looking youth watch. Waterproof and easy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Son took his new waterproof watch in the shower, as seen in the picture, water is now inside the casing Not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: G. Boston

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: A little big for my son but he liked it and it works so far so I guess it was worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Water proof....No!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a stocking stuffer and it lasted roughly two months. Water proofing was not good. Tub water took it out.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was impressed when it arrived... very nice. But it is definately man size, too large for a boy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wells

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if active in water.
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months, the screen went blank, possibly from water exposure. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mama&cubs

customer_reviews.title: Good watch so far.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my 12yr old son for his birthday. Fits great and seems pretty solid. Worked great right out of the box. So far good product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. After my son used it for a week it developed a rust spot on the bottom. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Just throwing your money away
customer_reviews.text: Watch is not waterproof. My nephew showered with it and it stopped working. Only had it for 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 yr old son loves his new watch he got for Christmas! It's really nice! Alot nicer than I had expected. I definitely recommend this watch for little boys.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Gammons

customer_reviews.title: Huge watch
customer_reviews.text: for my tall but slender 11 year old, this watch was comically large. I tried to encourage some kind of trendiness about the oversized watch thing but he just won't wear it. It works fine and he thinks it is cool in terms of functionality and the look of it but the chunkiness of it has left it sitting on his nightstand instead of his wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Scalise

customer_reviews.title: Watch Review
customer_reviews.text: The watch is an excellent value for the money. I saw similar watches in Walmart for $100!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Gunn

customer_reviews.title: It was OK for the price, then the day ...
customer_reviews.text: It was OK for the price, then the day before yesterday my wrist hurt, and when I looked down saw black goo everywhere. I took the watch off, and started to wipe off the goo, but it hurt. I did it gently, and the skin underneath...well, wasn't skin any more. Raw and oozing. I live in Florida and it's awfully hot down here, so I guess the temperature caused something to melt. Two days later and some of the skin hasn't closed up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gaelic Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves his watch. It fits him great and he’s very thin. Usually any watch fits him too big. He likes the light and the size of the numbers. I also like that the watch displays the date because he sounds so cute when someone asks what day it is and he answers!
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet functional for a young man
customer_reviews.text: Gave three stars for water resistant because we haven't used that feature. Watch is great for my son on his Scout campouts.
customer_reviews.author: AR1236

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my 11 year old grandson and he was thrilled with it. It is rugged and he loves the features especially the camo. It was a great price and delivery was quick. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Karan White

customer_reviews.title: Band came off
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for two months, then the pin came out and the band came off on one side. No luck getting it back on.
customer_reviews.author: BDL

customer_reviews.title: cheap but cheap
customer_reviews.text: its ok. my son likes it. I think think its a POS with redundant and strange buttons but hey.... he likes it!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t resist water. My sons watch got dogged up and now isn’t working after just 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bookman

customer_reviews.title: Smilll
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for a valentine gift for my nephew. He loves anything army When he gets it I will give u s update. You
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW1

customer_reviews.title: Return
customer_reviews.text: I sent this back due to it being to big for my 5 yr old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Remick

customer_reviews.title: Not a kids watch...way to big.
customer_reviews.text: Probably a nice watch...for an adult or teenager. However, not so much a “kids” watch. It’s extremely big and twice the size of my 8 year old sons wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 12-year-old son for his birthday. He is very rough on his stuff and so far this has held up to the abuse. He is very happy with it. It is a rather large face for a watch but he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice watch for the price point! We bought it as a gift for my son who wanted a G-Schock. You can’t really tell the difference between the two. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: April Tolley

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 6 year old ...the face is huge!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Little big for my 8 year old, but other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was thrilled with this watch. Just what he wanted. In fact his sister wanted one just like it and he said NO!
customer_reviews.author: W. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: It exactly “Boys”
customer_reviews.text: The watch is fine but “Boys” to me means it’s smaller and not the size of of “mens” watch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nagle

customer_reviews.title: Decent buy
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The band is very large and a little to big for a kid. But great for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest K.

customer_reviews.title: Way to big
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his watch and the camo but the watch is so big it fits an adult. Sending back....way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Di4math

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son is eight years old and he loves this watch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for my pre-teen son!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this watch to my son for Christmas and he is in love with it. Fits great and is very functional.
customer_reviews.author: GreekMamaP

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He is ruff on watches. This was very durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good buy so far!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! My seven year old nephew loves this watch!! He thinks he is something else when he wears it. I agree it wasnt much of a kids watch but it fits! He is learning to tell time, the date, and the day of the week. He loves that it lights up! We have not put it near water, mainly because all the reviews say it isnt waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Parris Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Great boy gift
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loved this, a bit big for his wrist but he said all of his friends wanted one! Cute style
customer_reviews.author: m. w.

customer_reviews.title: Great for many ages!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very grown-up looking. My 10-year-old nephew loved it! The LED backlight is a great part of this product!
customer_reviews.author: leigh j.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old killed it in 6 months. Got it at Xmas and wore it everyday. Not waterproof as some got behind the screen and that was all she wrote. Don’t reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Daniel J Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandchild and he was delighted
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t “boy” size, but we trimmed the band and it worked perfectly. Great for a boy who’s brother is a Marine and wants a watch like his!
customer_reviews.author: Nwags

customer_reviews.title: Be careful around water,  NOT waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: The description of this watch clearly states water PROOF. It is not. In this review it asks to rate water resistance. I understand the difference between the two. Misleading and incorrect description
customer_reviews.author: Robert Miksch

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these in different colors (light and dark camo). This one is much smaller than the other one despite the fact that the description is the same. The return window closed long before I gifted it and now I cannot return it. Seems ridiculous that the size is not standard.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Mosher

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old son. Loves it and he wears it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: VicDel44

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for Christmas. It doesn't look as cheap as I thought it would, I think he'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was absolutely thrilled with his watch, it's the same as his older brothers watch.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Dassau

customer_reviews.title: Camo watch
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for a military loving little boy and he loves his watch! Easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch for my 6 year old boy. Works great and he thinks it’s really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Taryn Mulcahey

customer_reviews.title: Good camping gear
customer_reviews.text: Good item for our newbie Boy Scout at a good price. Nice packaging and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Rice III

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cool watch.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool watch! I got these for my eight and four year old. Its a bit large for my four year old but fits eight year old.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loved!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved his watch for Christmas! It arrived as described and in just a day or two!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for a boy!
customer_reviews.text: One very happy 12 year old! No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschool Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This watch is excellent for the price!! It would definitely fit a mans wrist. My son is 15 and loves it. He has worn it in the pool and lake with no problem at all. Even my dad said he wants one!
customer_reviews.author: Katielovell477

customer_reviews.title: This runs big. I bought this for my skinny ...
customer_reviews.text: This runs big. I bought this for my skinny 9-year-old son and he wears it on the tightest hole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 10 year old for Christmas, he got it wet when washing his hands and now it is all fogged up. Disappointed that waterproof/resistant actually means do not wear for hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah Trussoni

customer_reviews.title: Skip it
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. My son was really excited to wear this and the minute it got wet the face fogged up, visible water appeared inside and it stopped working completely. Even more upsetting is that I missed the return widow. Worst purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: good watch but more mens size
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, seems durable. Bought it for my 8 yr old and it is a tad too big. More like a mens size watch.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Pasatiempo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it appears! Super cool for kids
customer_reviews.text: Kid freakin loves it. One of his many Xmas gifts. Just in time for school. A+ experience!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought watch for my nephew. Claims to be water resistant up to 50 meters. He ran through a sprinkler with it on got it wet and water got into the watch dial. You can see condensation inside. Needless to say the watch no longer works. Cost $23.52 with shipping. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Matais

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my 10 year old son. He absolutely loves it and wears it all the time. He says that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Shipping was fast. Going to give to Grandson on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cecetarget68

product_meta.title: Boys Camouflage LED Sports Watch,Waterproof Digital Electronic Military Wrist Kids Watch with Silicone Band Luminous Alarm Stopwatch Watches
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :9.45 x 0.79 x 1.89 inches; 3.2 Ounces
 * Item model number :1197-10
 * Department :Unisex-child
 * Batteries :1 CR2 batteries required.
 * Date First Available :October 24, 2016
 * Manufacturer :CakCity
 * ASIN :B01M70UP81

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #10,735 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #1 inBoys' Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars1,319 ratings
feature_bullets: Multifunction: Light,Stop Watch,Waterproof,Shockproof,Calendar,EL Backlight,Alarm Clock, this sport watch is perfect fit with all kinds of sports and it's really an everyday watch.

Fashionable, very charming for all occasions. Amazing looking watch, a great gift for family and friends.This boys watch is more suitable for most children over 10 years old, there are also a few children under ten years of age can also wear.
Digital watch: Fashionable sporty dial design, military style outlook. Large Dial and numbers with light, show time clear in the dark

Waterproof: 164 Ft / 50 M water resist, Feel free to wear the watch when you get wet in the rain, take a shower, or wash hands. But please DO NOT press any buttons under the water, and in case of damaging waterproof ring,please keep it away from steam and hot water.
What you get: CakCity Kids Watch*1, Manual*1, Our friendly customer services.
